translation.en: I'm in the tree house, Ivy!
translation.ko: 나 나무 위 집에 있어, 아이비!

translation.en: [Ivy] Giselle falls in love with a duke,
who likes her, but really, he's gonna marry a princess.
translation.ko: 공작도 지젤을 좋아하지만 공주와 결혼할 예정이지

translation.en: So Giselle dies of a broken heart.
Ow, my heart. I'm dead now.
translation.ko: 아이고, 내 마음아 난 이제 죽었네

translation.en: Her ghost goes into the forest
and meets these other ghosts with broken hearts called the Wilis.
translation.ko: 마음의 상처가 있는 유령 집단 윌리들을 만나

translation.en: And they all surround the duke and dance him… to death.
translation.ko: 모두가 공작을 에워싸고 죽을 때까지 춤추게 했어
- 나 지젤 할래! - 나 지젤 할래!

translation.en: Oh. Okay. You be Giselle first.
Uh… You can be one of the Wilis.
No, we need an evil duke, so you can kick his head off.
translation.ko: 아니, 사악한 공작이 있어야 머리를 차버리지

translation.en: But watch out, I… [exhales] …have a sword.
translation.ko: 하지만 조심해야 할걸? 나한테는 검이 있거든

translation.en: [Bean] Get away from me, Giselle ghost!
What that girl comes up with.
What is she supposed to be? -A superhero or something? -I…
translation.ko: 뭐지? 슈퍼히어로 그런 거 흉내 내나?

translation.en: [Bean screams] Your dancing is too strong for me.
Keep back, or I'll sword you.
I'll chop off your spinning little legs!
[Wilis] Dance you to death! Dance you to death! Dance you to death!
Now comes the part where I kick off your head!
Hey. Are you guys playing Wiffle ball?
You can be the duke, and Ivy and I can both be Giselles.
translation.ko: 네가 공작을 하면 나랑 아이비가 지젤을 할 수 있어

translation.en: It's jumping and kicking as high as your head!
translation.ko: 네 머리 높이로 점프도 하고 걷어차기도 한다고!

translation.en: Poor Leo. He doesn't know that ballet is about dancing your enemies to death.
translation.ko: 리오가 불쌍하다 발레는 죽을 때까지 적을 춤추게 하는 거란 걸 모르네

translation.en: Bean, what if we learned how to actually do ballet?
Aw, she was always trying to get me to dance.
-You didn't want to? -I have two left feet and zero rhythm.
But this is a great time for you to explore things
translation.ko: 지금 네 나이엔 관심 가는 걸 한번 해보는 것도 좋지

translation.en: that catch your interest, so ballet lessons it is.
translation.ko: 지금 네 나이엔 관심 가는 걸 한번 해보는 것도 좋지 그래, 발레 수업 받자

translation.en: You just have to ask your mom.
And now that your mom has said yes, my mom has to, too.
translation.ko: 네 엄마가 허락했으니 우리 엄마도 꼭 허락해야 해

translation.en: Enough, Nancy. Pick up the bread, please.
Since when is ballet your destiny?
The best part is kicking off heads.
-Whoa, whoa, whoa! Careful, twinkle toes. -[Nancy] Ugh!
Bean, we're not spending money on something you'll quit in two weeks.
translation.ko: 빈, 어차피 2주 후에 그만둘 일에 돈 못 쓴다

translation.en: [sighs] But I have to take lessons, Mom.
This is a great time to explore things that catch my interest.
translation.ko: 이 나이엔 관심 가는 걸 한번 해보는 게 좋다고요

translation.en: Didn't you tell me you had to take gymnastics?
Of course, you'll quit. I bet you $5 you'll quit.
Ten dollars. I won't quit, ever.
You won't even last learning all five positions.
translation.ko: 다섯 가지 자세를 다 배우기도 전에 끝날걸?

translation.en: Hang on. You let Nancy take ballet.
-That means you love her more than me. -Yeah.
-Love has nothing to do with it. -Please…
-Okay, Bean, you can take ballet. -[pleading stops]
You have to stick it out for the full term.
All the lessons. No quitting and no complaining.
translation.ko: 수업도 다 듣고 그만두거나 불평해서도 안 돼

translation.en: I promise, Mom, on an oath of spit.
Your promise is good enough. Go wash your hands.
translation.ko: 말로 한 거로도 충분해 손 씻고 와

translation.en: Ballet? Well, it's better than tap.
Bonjour, bonjour, bonjour, bonjour, bonjour! Bienvenue.
Welcome to The Joyful School of Ballet.
translation.ko: 조이풀 발레 학교에 온 걸 환영해요

translation.en: Seeing all your shining faces makes me smile.
translation.ko: 밝은 얼굴들을 보니 미소가 절로 지어지네요

translation.en: I am not only your instructor,
but I am also a fellow dancer myself.
And why, you might ask, do I dance?
-When I dance, my body and soul soars! -[mouthing]
translation.ko: 춤출 때 내 몸과 영혼은 날아오른답니다!

translation.en: I am your teacher, your maître de ballet, Mr. Joy.
translation.ko: 난 여러분의 선생님이자 발레의 '궈장' 조이 선생님이에요

translation.en: But here, you will call me Monsieur Joie.
That is how my name is pronounced in la belle française.
So here, I am Monsieur Joie, c'est moi.

translation.ko: - '조이'가 '주아'란 뜻이죠 - 자? - 제이 - '주아', 내 입을 잘 봐요

translation.en: Now, when I call your name,
-Who are you? -We're in your class. Ivy and Bean.
translation.ko: - 너희는 누구니? - 여기 학생이요, 아이비랑 빈이요

translation.en: Wha-wha-wha-wha… What are… What are you wearing?
This is a ballet class, not a circus camp.
translation.ko: 여긴 발레 학교지 서커스 캠프가 아니라고

translation.en: -[in heavy French accent] Melanie. -[bright piano music playing]
You are almost like a young me. Hmm.
Monsieur Joie, can I ask you a question?
-Yes. -When do we start kicking heads off?
translation.ko: - 그래 - 머리 차는 건 언제 해요?

translation.en: When do we do the fun ballet?
Like in Giselle. Sword fights, broken-hearted killer ghosts.
translation.ko: '지젤'에서처럼 칼싸움도 하고 원한 많은 킬러 유령들도 나오고요

translation.en: Hmm. Peut-être after you learn the basics.
-I'd say four or five minute-- -[gasps] Years!
Tendu, grand battement, grand battement, plié.
Tendu, grand battement, grand battement, plié--
Ah! Ah! Oh, wow. What… What is this?
My mom says that I should dance like no one's watching.
translation.ko: 아무도 안 보는 것처럼 춤추라고 엄마가 그랬어요

translation.en: Yes, well, I can understand why she'd tell you that.
Here, I'll show her, Monsieur Joie. Like this, Ivy.
translation.ko: 제가 아이비한테 보여줄게요 이렇게 해, 아이비

translation.en: [in French accent] No. No. No, no, no, no, no, no. No!
Okay, imagine… you are a gazelle.
Giselle? With the duke and ghostly Wilis?
translation.ko: 지젤이요? 공작이랑 유령 윌리들이 나오는 거요?

translation.en: Racing across the African plains, gracefully extending your limbs.
translation.ko: 아프리카 평원을 달리며 우아하게 다리를 뻗는 동물

translation.en: All right, all right! We're gonna forget the gazelle, and we're going to march.
translation.ko: 좋아! 가젤은 잊고 행진을 할 거야

translation.en: -[rhythmic music plays] -March. Knees up and march.
[in rhythmic tone] Not you. You are ballet students.
Just Ivy's marching, and apparently Bean.
Everyone laughed. I never want to go back.
translation.ko: 다들 비웃더라 다신 여기 오기 싫어

translation.en: Ballet is not our destiny, Ivy.
Nancy, could you just slow down a little bit?
translation.ko: 낸시, 좀 느긋하게 마음먹을 순 없니?

translation.en: We're studying puberty. Sixth graders aren't doing that.
translation.ko: 사춘기도 공부하는데 6학년은 그런 거 안 해요

translation.en: Fourth graders aren't, but there are plenty of them who have earrings.
translation.ko: 4학년도 안 하는데 귀걸이 한 애들은 천지라고요

translation.en: -[kid's mom] Hi, Charlotte! -Impossible. No way. You hated it.
translation.ko: 말도 안 돼, 싫은 거 다 티나

translation.en: I bet Monsieur Joie ate you alive.
We are the stars of the class.
Twenty dollars that says no way are you two dorks ever gonna be the stars.
translation.ko: 너희 두 얼간이가 결코 주연이 못 된다는 것에 20달러 걸게

translation.en: Actually, I'm preparing to be rich.
translation.ko: 뭐 하러? 난 부자가 될 건데

translation.en: -Nancy, please. This car is not a casino. -[sighs]
What are you boys up to?
A spell won't help. I had to promise I wouldn't quit.
-[Bean groans] -Turn back time and erase the past.
they won't even remember we talked about ballet
translation.ko: 우리가 발레 얘기 했던 것도 수업료 냈단 것도

translation.en: or that they paid for it.
Bean, do you want to take capoeira lessons?
It's been so long since you've taken any kind of lessons, anywhere.
translation.ko: 네가 어디서, 뭘 배운 지가 너무 오래된 거 같구나

translation.en: Mom will forget my promise, and Nancy will forget the bet.
translation.ko: 엄마는 나와 약속한 걸 잊고 낸시는 내기한 걸 잊겠네

translation.en: [Katrine] Thank you so much. My pleasure. My pleasure. You know, I remember…
I'm like, "How you gonna make it fluffy?" How is it even gonna be thick?
translation.ko: 부풀어 오르기나 할까 싶었죠 아몬드 우유를 넣으면 반죽이 걸쭉해지기나…

translation.en: I think ballet broke my knee bone, Mom.
translation.ko: 발레 하다가 무릎뼈가 부러진 거 같아요

translation.en: -Did you paint your knee? -[clicks tongue] No.
Rose and nettle, flies and leaf, erase the past, relieve our grief! -[gasps] -[Charlotte] Ooh!
translation.ko: 장미와 쐐기풀, 파리와 나뭇잎이여 과거를 지우고 슬픔을 내보내라!

translation.en: Are you throwing flies at me?
Do you remember what day it is?
Yes. It is the day that you threw dead insects and leaf bits into our dinner.
translation.ko: 응, 네가 우리 저녁에 죽은 곤충이랑 나뭇잎을 던진 날

translation.en: Can you tell me the name of your favorite anthropologist?
translation.ko: 엄마가 가장 좋아하는 인류학자 이름이 뭐죠?

translation.en: Can you tell me the name of what we're gonna eat now?
translation.ko: 이제 우린 뭘 먹어야 할지부터 얘기해 볼래?

translation.en: I made a long time ago?
When you agreed to stick with ballet?
Did you put a spell on us?
Because we want to quit ballet.
I thought it'd be fun, but everyone laughed.
translation.ko: 재미있을 줄 알았는데 다들 비웃기만 했다고요

translation.en: You don't have to take ballet.
If it's not for you, just… just stop.
I want you to explore things,
so you can find out what you are and aren't passionate about.
translation.ko: 네가 뭘 좋아하고 뭘 싫어하는지 알아가길 바라

translation.en: Hmm. You did discover something. You discovered that ballet wasn't for you.
translation.ko: 이번 기회를 통해 발레는 너와 안 맞는다는 걸 알았잖아

translation.en: Mom, you're so unfair. Ivy's mom let her quit.
translation.ko: 이러는 게 어딨어요? 아이비 엄마는 허락해 줬잖아요

translation.en: Moms are different just the way kids are different.
translation.ko: 엄마들은 다 달라 애들이 다 다르듯

translation.en: But I'm not different from Ivy.
I also discovered ballet isn't for me, so how come I can't quit?
translation.ko: 발레는 나랑 안 맞는다는 걸 알았는데 왜 난 그만 못 둬요?

translation.en: [Charlotte] Aside from the fact that you made a promise?
Because I want you to learn how to stick with something, Bean.
translation.ko: 엄마는 네가 뭐라도 꾸준히 하는 법을 배웠으면 해

translation.en: But if you work at it and persevere, you might discover you're good at it.
translation.ko: 근데 꾸준하게 열심히 하면 소질이 있을지 누가 아니?

translation.en: Or die of boredom. It happens, you know.
translation.ko: 그러다 지루해서 죽어요 그렇게 죽는 사람 있다고요

translation.en: Or learn to like it. Either way, I think you'll survive.
translation.ko: 좋아하게 될 수도 있어 어쨌든 넌 안 죽을 거야

translation.en: Come on. Now, go take a bath.
No, you made me take a bath yesterday.
[David] Bean, straight to bed. Lights out in ten minutes.
translation.ko: 빈, 바로 침대에 누워 10분 뒤에 불 끈다

translation.en: -[radio static] -[Ivy] Wanda Rich reporting for duty.
-[Bean sighs] -[Ivy] Grizzly Girl? Are you there?
She really won't let you quit?
[sighs] Nope. I even tried to cry.
She just told me to stop drooling.
If you have to do ballet, I think I have to do it too.
translation.ko: 네가 발레를 해야 한다면 나도 그냥 할게

translation.en: I was the one who got you into this.
What if you fall, like, a hundred times?
translation.ko: 막 수백 번 넘어지고 그러면 어떡해?

translation.en: What if you twirl so much your toes bleed in your ballet shoes
translation.ko: 너무 많이 빙글빙글 돌아서 발레화에 발가락 피 다 묻히고

translation.en: and get scabs that fall off and bleed even more?
[sighs] What if kids laugh at you?
-[grunts] -[Monsieur Joie] Oh, no. No, no, no.
[Monsieur Joie] All right, mes enfants. Settle down. Settle down.
This year, for the first time,
we are not doing a little recital here in the studio.
translation.ko: 올해 발표회는 이 스튜디오에서 하지 않아요

translation.en: Instead, we are taking part in A Festival of Movement.
Which is why I have chosen something très unique for this performance.
translation.ko: 그래서 이번 공연을 위해 '아쭈' 특별한 걸 준비했답니다

translation.en: For this is a story of two magical creatures who fall in love.
translation.ko: 사랑에 빠진 신비로운 두 생명체의 이야기

translation.en: It is called Wedding Beneath the Sea.
-Eric? -There's not any kissy stuff, is there?
[in French accent] No. No, no, no, no.
Your… Your… Your emotions are expressed through the artistry of dance.
translation.ko: 너희 감정은 발레의 예술적 기교로 표현될 거예요

translation.en: -Say it with me. When I dance… -My body and soul soars?
translation.ko: - 같이 외쳐보아요, 춤출 때… - 내 몸과 영혼이 날아올라요?

translation.en: My body and soul soars. Yes, Zuzu. Merci.
translation.ko: 내 몸과 영혼이 날아올라요 맞아요, 주주 '메르시'

translation.en: Emma, you are a tropical fish who marries them.
The rest of you are wedding guests. You bring presents.
translation.ko: 나머지는 결혼식 하객 선물을 가져오는 역할이죠

translation.en: What do Bean and I do?
You'll be delighted to know I have taken on the choreographic challenge.
translation.ko: 안무 짜기가 힘들었지만 이 선생님이 해냈단 말이지

translation.en: What would you even call… Movements.

translation.ko: 너희는 오징어 친구가 돼서 감시병 역할을 할 거예요 무대 저 아주아주
감시병 역할을 할 거예요 무대 저 아주아주

translation.en: at the very, very, very, very, very, very, very, very, very, very edge of the stage.
translation.ko: 감시병 역할을 할 거예요 무대 저 아주아주 아주아주 먼 구석에서

translation.en: Like so, your tentacles waving on the passing tide,
ensuring the success of the wedding.
-Friendly squid? -They're just happy to be there.
translation.ko: - 오징어 친구요? - 결혼식에 오게 해준 게 어디니?

translation.en: The invitation strictly said no babies and no squid.
Oh! Best of all, this year's performance takes place at…
translation.ko: 가장 좋은 소식은 말이죠 올해 공연이 열리는 곳은

translation.en: It's not that I want to be like everyone else.
translation.ko: 딴 애들처럼 되고 싶다는 건 아니에요

translation.en: It's just… Earrings are fun, Mom.
I said the same thing to your grandma when I was your age.
translation.ko: 나도 네 나이 때 네 외할머니에게 딱 그렇게 말했지

translation.en: I wanted to dye my hair green.
You look like you actually hurt your knee bone this time.
translation.ko: 이번에는 진짜로 무릎뼈를 다친 거 같구나

translation.en: -How are these two doing? -We… Oh, yes… They're…. They're, um…
I've never had budding little dancers who are… who are quite so…
translation.ko: 우리 신입생들은 말이죠 저로선 처음 보는…

translation.en: You know, I don't think that there's a word for it in French.
I bet you have fun parts.
Yeah. Fun parts as the stars of the show, right?

translation.ko: 우린 모든 장면에 나와 - 그러셔? - 올해는 새로운 댄서도 나오네

translation.en: [Charlotte] You got some new dancers this year.

translation.ko: "두 오징어 친구들 아이비와 빈" 너희 두 오징어 친구들이니?

translation.en: Nancy, could you be nice to your sister, just once?
translation.ko: 낸시 동생한테 한 번이라도 친절할 수는 없겠니?

translation.en: I cannot wait to see Bean as the friendly squid.
translation.ko: 오징어 친구로 변신한 빈을 얼른 보고 싶네요

translation.en: No one's gonna laugh, Bean. Everybody is going to be very proud.
translation.ko: 비웃는 사람은 없을 거야, 빈 모두가 무척 자랑스러워할 거란다

translation.en: Eric, honey, you were supposed to paint the fish, not yourself.
translation.ko: 에릭, 물고기에 색칠을 해야지 왜 네 몸에 색칠을 하니?

translation.en: Okay. Ten more minutes, class, then we'll hang your fish prints on the wall.
translation.ko: 10분 남았어요 다 하면 판화를 벽에 걸 거예요

translation.en: Please get these permission slips signed by your parents as soon as possible,
otherwise you won't be able to go on the field trip.
translation.ko: 안 그러면 현장 학습에 못 가요

translation.en: Zuzu said you guys are gonna be like this fish at your recital.
translation.ko: 주주가 그러는데 발표회에서 너희 이런 물고기가 된다며?

translation.en: Why do you care? You're not even coming.
Who else is going to the dance festival?
translation.ko: 댄스 축제에 가는 사람 또 있어?

translation.en: [kid 1] I didn't know you can dance, Ivy.
And definitely not wiggling, friendly squid. [chuckles]
translation.ko: 특히 꿈틀거리는 오징어 친구를 보진 않아

translation.en: I might be there for the wiggling, friendly squid.
translation.ko: 난 꿈틀거리는 오징어 친구를 보러 갈지도 몰라

translation.en: What exactly is a squid? It has ink, right?
translation.ko: 정확히 오징어가 뭐야? 먹물 있는 애지? 이상하게 생긴 다리도 달렸고
먹물 있는 애지? 이상하게 생긴 다리도 달렸고

translation.en: Okay, class, who wants the horseshoe crab? -[kid 3] I do! I do!
It's an arthropod, a living fossil.
And then there's this little invertebrate. A squid!
[in silly voice] I'm doing ballet. I'm so silly.
[Ivy sighs] That was just the beginning, Bean.
The whole school will be laughing at us.
Nancy, too. She'll see we're not the stars of the show,
translation.ko: 우리가 주연이 아닌 걸 알고 낸시도 비웃겠지

translation.en: I'll have to do chores forever to pay that.
translation.ko: 그 돈을 벌려면 난 평생 심부름해야 해

translation.en: There has to be some way out of this.
Being good at ballet is impossible.
But it wouldn't be impossible to break our legs.

translation.ko: 아이비, 이러면 안 될 거 같아

translation.en: [sighs] You know, when Eric broke his arm,
you could almost see his bone sticking out.
translation.ko: 뼈가 튀어나온 게 보일 거 같더라니까

translation.en: -Maybe breaking is a very bad idea. -Mmm-hmm.
translation.ko: 다리 부러뜨리는 건 없던 거로 하자
- 이것도 괜한 짓이었어! - 이것도 괜한 짓이었어!

translation.en: Probably just a bruise would work.
[Katrine] You know what would make this? If we did something around the neck with like a scarf?
translation.ko: 목에 스카프 같은 걸 두르면 어떨까요?

translation.en: -Or, um, what about a bow tie? -Bow tie, yes.
The problem is there's not enough tentacles.
The number of tentacles is definitely the problem.
[Nancy] I can't wait to see this.
-You girls are gonna be great. -[Bean] Hmm.
There's got to be some way not to do this besides breaking bones.
translation.ko: 다리를 부러뜨리는 거 말고 다른 방법이 있을 거야

translation.en: Are you sure you haven't figured out that invisibility spell?
translation.ko: 투명 주문 아직 완성 못 했어?

translation.en: I don't think any spell can help us now.
translation.ko: 지금은 어떤 마법도 도움이 안 될 거 같아

translation.en: Maybe we can just hide ourselves up in the tree house
They'd probably just cut it down and make us go.
Mmm, maybe we should just run away?
I love running away. Where should we go?
-There's a policeman with a dog. -[door opens]

translation.ko: - 우리 냄새 맡을 거야 - 잘 가요

translation.en: -[Katrine] Thanks for the costumes. -[David] You're welcome.
-[Charlotte] See you tomorrow. -[Katrine] Dinner in a half-hour, Ivy.
I signed your permission slip for the aquarium.
Don't forget to put it in your bag.
[gasps] I can't believe we didn't see this.
It's the same day as the recital.
We can run away and hide at the aquarium.
By the time they find us, the dance festival will be over.
translation.ko: 들킬 때쯤 댄스 축제는 끝났을 거야

translation.en: Be careful. Cross the street. Come on.
The minute no one's watching, we'll find a place to hide.
translation.ko: 아무도 안 볼 때 숨을 곳을 찾자

translation.en: Ivy, Bean, come on, keep up.
I don't want to lose you.
Today, the Marine Mammal Rescue Team will be feeding the dolphins at 2 p.m…
translation.ko: 오늘 오후 2시에 돌고래 특별 훈련이 있을 예정…

translation.en: I brought fish chum for the sharks.
translation.ko: 난 상어 주려고 생선 토막 가져왔어

translation.en: I wanna see a feeding frenzy.
-I'd love to see a feeding frenzy. -Ugh!
-[Emma] And I love sharks. -[Bean] How about down there?
translation.ko: - 나 상어 너무 좋아 - 저 아래로 갈까?

translation.en: Okay, listen up everyone. Come here, please. Come on.
translation.ko: 다들 주목해요, 이리로 와요 얼른 이리 와요

translation.en: -Come here. -[Eric] Whoa! This place is great.
Ivy, Bean, come up with the rest of us, please.
We're gonna stay on the first floor today, all right?
Eric, Paisley couldn't make it. So, you and Vanessa should buddy up today.
translation.ko: 에릭, 페이즐리는 못 왔으니까 버네사랑 짝꿍 하자

translation.en: Even just one great white? Or any other color will do.
Dusit, we're gonna hand this over to our expert guide.
translation.ko: 듀싯, 이제 전문가 선생님께서 지도해 주실 거야

translation.en: -And we'll get questions after, okay? -[class] Whoa!
The sea lions, who call this tank home, are faster than any other type of seal.
translation.ko: 이 수족관에서 사는 바다사자는 어떤 바다표범보다도 빨라요

translation.en: They can move at 25 miles per hour, which helps them feed on sardines.
translation.ko: 시속 40km 속도로 움직이다 보니 정어리 사냥도 잘하죠

translation.en: -[kid 4] Oh, they're beautiful! -But they also love to play not with….
sharks so much, but they are very good surfers.
translation.ko: 상어랑 노는 건 안 좋아하지만 파도는 엄청 잘 탄답니다

translation.en: [Ms. Aruba-Tate] Eric, don't touch the glass, please.
translation.ko: 에릭, 유리에 손대지 마 혹시 사고 날라

translation.en: -We don't want any accidents. -Bean. We gotta go.
translation.ko: 에릭, 유리에 손대지 마 혹시 사고 날라 빈, 우리 가야 해

translation.en: -[kid 6] Dusit… -Whoa! [Ms. Aruba-Tate] Dusit, put away the fish chum, please.
Whoa. That could be where we hide out.
[Bean] It's so private. I call this one!
translation.ko: 사람도 없어, 이 자리 내 거!

translation.en: Okay. There's gotta be one somewhere.
[aquarium narrator] The ocean is full of many mysteries…
-Whoa. -…but none quite as mysterious as the creatures of the deep.
This shows what life is like at the bottom of the sea.
[aquarium narrator] The extraordinary anglerfish has a luminous spine
translation.ko: 기괴한 아귀는 가시 같은 돌기로 빛을 내서

translation.en: that lures victims into its sharp teeth.
I think I'd rather do the recital.
[aquarium narrator] In these black waters lurks the dragon of the deep,
translation.ko: 밤처럼 캄캄한 물속엔 심해의 용이 도사립니다

translation.en: -[Bean gasps] -[aquarium narrator] It watches and waits…
Are you brave enough to face its tentacles?
Ivy, Bean, where were you? I was so worried.
translation.ko: 아이비, 빈, 어디 있었니? 엄청 걱정했잖아

translation.en: Oh, no. Because you were lost?
You poor things. I'm so sorry.
I told you they weren't dead.
I didn't say dead. I said, "Probably eaten by a sea lion."
translation.ko: 내가 언제 죽었다고 했냐? 바다사자한테 먹혔을 거라고 했지

translation.en: [Ms. Aruba-Tate] It's okay. You're here and safe.
We got to see the eels, and you didn't.
translation.ko: 우린 장어 봤는데 너희는 못 봤지?

translation.en: Not as intimidating as a giant squid.
It had this freaky big eye that hypnotized us.
Bean, a squid can't hypnotize people.
[Leo] There is not a giant squid in here.
How did you guys get to the Creatures of the Deep room?
That's on a totally different floor.
Did you get lost on purpose?
It was kind of my fault, Ms. Aruba-Tate. Don't blame Ivy.
translation.ko: 제 잘못이에요, 선생님 아이비를 혼내지 마세요

translation.en: We started off a little lost, and then I said, "Let's go this way."
translation.ko: 처음엔 길을 살짝 잃어서 제가 이쪽으로 가자고 했는데

translation.en: But it was the wrong way.
So, I said, "Here are some stairs that we can go down together."
translation.ko: 그래서 제가 그랬죠 '여기 계단이 있네 우리 같이 내려가 보자'

translation.en: [Ms. Aruba-Tate] We're gonna be leaving in a minute. Yes!
if I can't trust you two to behave safely and responsibly,
translation.ko: 너희가 안전하고 책임감 있게 행동하지 못하면

translation.en: you realize I won't be able to take you on any future field trips.
translation.ko: 앞으론 현장 학습에 같이 못 가는 거 알지?

translation.en: I am too. Really sorry. Really.
I know you can help each other do better when it comes to things like this.
translation.ko: 너희는 이런 일이 생기면 서로 도와서 더 잘할 수 있잖아

translation.en: I also know you can help each other do great things.
translation.ko: 서로 도와서 멋진 일을 할 수도 있고

translation.en: Eric told me that you're all performing in a dance recital tonight.
translation.ko: 오늘 밤 댄스 발표회에서 너희 다 같이 공연한다며?

translation.en: I'm really looking forward to it.
[driver] All right, kids. Please take your seats.
[announcer] Welcome, one and all, to tonight's Dance Delirium.
translation.ko: "버로스 극장 광란의 댄스 축제" '광란의 댄스 축제'에 오신 여러분 모두를 환영합니다

translation.en: -You will be delighted, amazed, and… -Twenty-six acts?
I hate how they design these recitals to go on forever.
translation.ko: 짜증 나게 이런 발표회는 왜 이렇게 길게 하나 몰라

translation.en: Oh, I… I mean, not yours, honey. You were great.
translation.ko: 네 발표회는 아니었단다 넌 아주 멋졌어

translation.en: No, no, it's fine. This is gonna be great.
There's no way these squidiots are gonna be stars of the show.
Act 14 will start in one minute.
Put some muscle into it, Maman.
[Monsieur Joie] Put your back into it, Maman.
which is good because in the program
it does say that you are friendly squids.
I don't think Monsieur Joie has seen a real squid.
translation.ko: '무슈' 주아는 진짜 오징어를 못 본 거 같아

translation.en: A real giant squid is not friendly at all.
[Monsieur Joie] Who has the glitter? The glitter is très important!
-[Monsieur Joie] Then, now I can focus. -Oh, no.
You really can't dance with those tentacles.
translation.ko: 그 다리를 달고는 춤을 못 추겠다

translation.en: Which, when you think about it is, well, probably a good thing.
translation.ko: 그런데 생각해 보니까 - 잘된 일일지 몰라 - 역할에 집중해

translation.en: [Monsieur Joie] Feel the water. See the coral.
Well, you certainly are, um… well-tentacled.
Uh, just please don't knock down the set.
-Tout de suite! That means get on stage! -[kid] Go, go.
[announcer] Please take your seats. Act 14 is about to commence.
-Is that really Bean and Ivy? -So goofy.
translation.ko: - 쟤들 빈과 아이비 맞아? - 완전 바보 같아

translation.en: -[Bean] Look, Ivy, over here! Quickly! -[Ivy] Ah!
-Wait. Are we supposed to be in the back? -Oh.
A real squid is the opposite of friendly.
A real squid would never just stand around wiggling.
translation.ko: 진짜 오징어라면 가만히 서서 꿈틀대지 않아

translation.en: A real squid just lurks in the shadows
until it's time to attack, like the Wilis in Giselle.
A real squid doesn't care about a stupid bet with a stupid big sister.
translation.ko: 진짜 오징어는 한심한 언니와 한 한심한 내기는 신경 쓰지 않아

translation.en: A real squid doesn't care if people laugh at them.
translation.ko: 진짜 오징어는 사람들이 비웃어도 상관 안 해

translation.en: A real squid doesn't care about anything.
translation.ko: 진짜 오징어는 아무것도 신경 쓰지 않아

translation.en: Go. Go, go, go. Faster. Come on, faster.
Come on, friendly squid. Help a whale out!
translation.ko: 올라타, 오징어 친구들아 날 밖으로 내보내 줘

translation.en: [in French accent] No, no, no, no, no.
When I dance, my body and soul soars! [chuckles]
translation.ko: 춤출 때 내 몸과 영혼이 날아오른답니다!

translation.en: [Monsieur Joie] The show must go on.
And we never have to go back on stage!
Or stand around in first position. We can do what squid do.
translation.ko: 제1 자세로 안 서 있어도 돼 우린 오징어처럼 굴 수 있어

translation.en: [audience chanting] Squid! Squid! Squid! -Huh? -[audience] Squid! Squid! [clapping rhythmically] Squid! Squid!
[all] Squid! Squid! Squid! Squid! Squid! Squid! Squid! Squid!
You were right not to let them quit.
Yes, but let's agree that they're quitting after this.
translation.ko: 네, 하지만 이거 끝나면 그만 보냅시다

translation.en: -[Bean] Yeah. -Three hundred people cheering for us?
all I can say to you two is…
-Mom, I can get my ears pierced? -Mmm-hmm.
You convinced me a while ago, honey. I was just waiting for the perfect moment.
translation.ko: 이미 한참 전에 너한테 설득됐어 완벽한 순간을 기다렸을 뿐이야

translation.en: Twenty dollars, Ivy. Twenty! We're rich!
It's our money. You heard my sister, we earned it.
translation.ko: 우리 돈이야, 언니 말 들었잖아 우리가 번 거라고

translation.en: So, what should we spend it on?
There's so many things we can do together.
translation.ko: 같이 할 수 있는 게 너무 많아

translation.en: I've got some pretty good ideas.

translation.ko: 아이비, 빈, 빨리 와 너희가 공연을 살렸어, 얼른 와

translation.en: -You saved the day. Come on! -[kids chuckle]
-[ballet student] Squid versus squid! -[ballet students] Go squid!
I'm making the Pit of Doom.
The only thing that's gonna fall in this pit is you.
-Why don't you ask the new girl? -[Bean] Ivy? All she does is read.
translation.ko: - 그 새로 온 애한테 물어봐 - 아이비요? 걔는 책 읽는 것밖에 안 해요 쉬는 시간에 읽는다고요

translation.en: -She reads at recess. -What's wrong with Bean?
translation.ko: 걔는 책 읽는 것밖에 안 해요 쉬는 시간에 읽는다고요 빈이 뭐 어때서?

translation.en: She just runs around and makes noise.
Just wanna wash your uniform for you! [grunts]
You know the rules. Three strikes, you're out.
[Ivy] I just learned the spell that makes you dance forever.
translation.ko: 영원히 춤추게 하는 마법을 얼마 전에 배웠어

translation.en: [Bean] Let's sneak through the backyards to creep up on Nancy and do the spell.
translation.ko: 뒷마당으로 살금살금 가서 낸시한테 몰래 간 뒤 마법을 걸자

translation.en: I hope you're ready to dance forever!
♪ When you feel this good There's nothing that can get you down ♪
